title: Away Moderation
announcement: Away is an open source state of the art Discord Moderation bot developed for Discord Hack Week.

help.description: Relay information about the Away Moderation Bot.

prefix.description: Change the phrase used as the prefix. Default is ^.
prefix.error: Please specify a single phrase to set a new prefix.
prefix.success: You have updated Away's prefix succesfully.

streval.description: Manage the string evaluation feature (keyword moderation).
streval.error: Please specify the desired status or strength for string evaluation.
streval.success: You have updated Away's string evaluation status succesfully.

reset.description: Wipe and reset your server data for Away.
reset.success: You have wiped and reset Away's data for your server.
